sections.heading: Purchase of tickets and receipt of prizes by certain persons prohibited5-567
sections.text: Purchase of tickets and receipt of prizes by certain persons prohibitedA. A lottery ticket or share may not be purchased by and a prize may not be paid to an officer or employee of the commission or to any spouse, child, br
